targets.query:
from(bucket: "nodered-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "51D2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "nodered-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "51D2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "nodered-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "51D2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Consumption")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

data = from(bucket: "nodered-bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "51D2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Consumption")

firstVal = data |> first()
lastVal  = data |> last()

union(tables: [firstVal, lastVal])
  |> group()  // merge all rows into one table
  |> reduce(
      identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0},
      fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
          first: if accumulator.first == 0.0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
          last: r._value
      })
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _value: if r.last - r.first >= 0 then r.last - r.first else -(r.last - r.first),
      _field: "delta_Consumption"
  }))
